references: Related: CF 272298. Amending: Ord 88522, Ord 90789, Ord 99422, Ord 93631.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to sick leave for certain officers and employees of the Department of Transportation, establishing sick leave credit for prior service, providing benefits for accumulated and unused sick leave upon retirement, and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 88522 and Sections 1 and 1.1 of Ordinance 90789.
